Wonky Sprout OS

THE FIX-IT BLUEPRINT

Stop patching. Start fixing.

WHO IS THIS FOR?

Neurodivergent professionals drowning in chaos.

You are:

  • An ADHD/autistic professional managing complex workflows
  • Overwhelmed by executive dysfunction and context switching
  • Building systems that collapse under real-world pressure
  • Tired of productivity advice that doesn‚Äôt account for your brain
  • Looking for structure that works with neurodivergence, not against it

You don‚Äôt need motivation. You need mechanical systems that run on autopilot when your brain can‚Äôt.

WHAT YOU NEED

A systems audit + custom protocol implementation.

The Problem:

Your current ‚Äúsystem‚Äù is a collection of half-implemented tools, abandoned apps, and good intentions. When executive function fails, everything falls apart.

What You Actually Need:

  1. Root cause diagnosis - Find the single breakdown point collapsing your workflow
  2. Neurodivergent-aware protocols - SOPs designed for brains that work in bursts, not flows
  3. Emergency procedures - IPIs (Immediate Problem Instructions) for when you freeze
  4. Trackable metrics - Daily check-ins that catch problems before catastrophic failure

What You Get:

  • Systems Audit Report - Detailed analysis of your current chaos
  • Custom SOP Package - 3-5 protocols tailored to your workflow (Morning Routine, Task Capture, Weekly Review, Context Switching Recovery, etc.)
  • Emergency Protocol Set - 2-3 IPIs for your most common failure modes (Executive Dysfunction, Sensory Overload, Burnout Recovery)
  • Implementation Guide - Step-by-step deployment plan with fallback procedures

HOW IT WORKS

1-week diagnostic ‚Üí Custom SOP delivery.

Week 1: The Chaos Intake (Days 1-2)

90-minute diagnostic session where you dump everything:

  • Current workflows (what you‚Äôre trying to do)
  • Failure points (where it breaks down)
  • Tools/apps you‚Äôve tried and abandoned
  • Neurodivergent-specific challenges (sensory issues, executive dysfunction patterns, masking burnout)

My role: Act as ‚Äúbubble shield‚Äù - absorb all the data without judgment, listen for patterns your brain can‚Äôt see when you‚Äôre in the noise.

Deliverable: Voice-recorded session + written summary sent within 24 hours.

Week 1: The Systems Analysis (Days 3-5)

I disappear into my ‚Äúcard catalog‚Äù brain and map your chaos:

  • Identify the root cause (the single flawed assumption breaking everything)
  • Find non-conforming conditions (where your actual behavior conflicts with your intended system)
  • Design neurodivergent-compatible protocols (structure that works when executive function is offline)

My method: 15 years as a Navy systems diagnostician + lived experience with Autism/ADHD. I build systems that account for brain variability, not fantasy-land consistency.

Deliverable: Root Cause Analysis document (2-3 pages, plain language, no corporate BS).

Week 1: The Fix Delivery (Days 6-7)

You receive The Wonky Sprout Systems Blueprint:

Custom SOPs (3-5 protocols):

  • Formatted like Industrial Process Instructions (IPI) - numbered steps, no fluff
  • Designed for low-executive-function states
  • Include ‚Äúif this fails, do this‚Äù fallback procedures
  • Printable checklist versions for paper backups

Emergency Protocols (2-3 IPIs):

  • Quick-reference cards for crisis states
  • Example: ‚ÄúExecutive Dysfunction Emergency‚Äù - 5-step reboot sequence
  • Laminated-ready format for physical deployment

Implementation Roadmap:

  • Week-by-week rollout plan (because trying to change everything at once = guaranteed failure)
  • Metrics to track (daily check-ins, weekly reviews)
  • Adjustment protocol (what to do when it‚Äôs not working)

INVESTMENT

$1,500 for complete 1-week engagement.

Includes:

  • 90-minute diagnostic session
  • Root cause analysis
  • 3-5 custom SOPs
  • 2-3 emergency IPIs
  • Implementation guide
